column3: “This hit me hard within the first 15 minutes, I only needed a little. Which was surprising compared to most of the other strains I do. I usually take about 30-40 hits in order to become fully medicated.  I tend to have the opposite effects, where a Sativa would give you Energy, it would put me to sleep. Indica's give me energy and I am able to function better than normal like a well oiled machine. It's great for pain...”

“First got this strain from Lake Effect Dispensary in Portage,MI. Saw the THC levels were some of the highest I've seen! The buds were nice and healthy with a strong effervescent aroma. Hit me in the head fast and steady with a little bit of body tingling. Taste is delicious with a spicy, tangy favor. I can feel a little bite on the aftet taste. Definitely another discovery that has moved into option rotation when sel...”

“They really should  rename this one Apathy Skunk. Pretty damn strong, but a creeper. Took 15 to 20 minutes to fully kick, but then, game over. You're in for a solid 2-3 hour high. For fun, I'd give this one Five stars. For relief, probably 8. Didn't notice any paranoia and munchies were 6 out 10. Definitely a stay at home and do nothing weed when your give a shit is broken and your care about is gone. Lazy, lazy, laz...”

“Great for pain and insomnia, this definitely has the ability to put me to sleep with ease even though it's a hybrid strain. I definitely try to save it for the end of the day or days when my pain is unbearable because of it's very strong sedation effect. Use with caution if you're new to concentrates and choose that form; it's potency really affected me despite microdosing consistently. The strain has lasted a long t...”

“The taste of tea rose, and some pungent tones that give it a nice smooth medicated punch to its taste. Long pine like buds that are coned at the top, nice green leafs Its color is very nice. Its kick is a slow riser for pain its a creeper for the body. The head high hits you within a few hits, the body will come after. Its great for a night time or evening strain if you're in need of some chill sleep. I recommend tho...”

“Overall nice strain.  Got at a pretty high Thc rate of 27, so I was expecting it to live up to the hype.  I have smoked a'lot of Skunk variations, but not this one.  Mine smelled like pineapple and cheese and tasted a little of the same.  Worked great for pain, anxiety, stress, appetite and insomnia.  Overall nice feeling and pretty long lasting relief.  Would buy again.”

“This has quickly become one of my go to strains. For me it's all about that feeling. This hybrid had that feeling for me. It keeps my pain at bay while allowing to function with a clear focus. The smell I usually get is an earthy citrus aroma but I'm sure that will vary. I would definitely recommend this strain to the chronic pain patient looking for a strain to micro dose throughout the day.”

“Pineapple skunk is great if you're having a lot of pain a lot of ADHD there is also a lot of stress and PTSD.I suggest this if you are having a lot of symptoms and your conditions are worsening by the second. Pineapple skunk is very fruity smelling and has a very rows in the leaf like the taste. It's also very Skunky fills the room. You will be coughing on this one but it will be a good one to some to relax, and mell...”

“With a fragrance much like a field of grass with perhaps just a waft of sweet, citrus, my batch of Pineapple Skunk (bud) smoked in a bowl tastes quite smooth. Difficult to pinpoint flavors at first, but it's a soft & smooth smoke, not harsh or hot or spicy-- but inviting, tempting, compelling me for a third hit right now, and already I'm feeling it's smooth, mellow lift, both in mind and body, and both quite nicely.....”

“This strain is great for insomnia.  I didn't get any feeling of euphoria or giddiness that I expected based on the comments from the dispensary clerk I bought it from.  After just a few hits, I fell asleep almost immediately... and I slept really deeply.  I wouldn't recommend it for relieving anxiety/stress if you don't also want to go to bed right afterwards.”

“Illera Pineapple 🍍 Skunk Sauce - Trying out a new sauce today that comes in at 69% THC and 2.7% CBD with the rest being Terps 
.
.
.
I’ve heard that this is a nice relaxing you for Xtreme what I’ve read from it seems very similar to a gorilla glue or a Girl Scout cookies but we will have to see going to use probably one tiny drop as this is extremely concentrated. Let’s go 💨 
.
.
Used 2 tiny drops and The taste is ...”
“A nice cerebral high for a predominantly indica strain. Couch lock after about an hour. Onset nice euphoric come up. Duration mid range. Overall a good smoke.”
“One of my favorites for just a mellow relaxing night. One of my top 5 favorite strains for sure. I prefer this strain out of a pipe. Enjoy!”
“I just got my medical card and choose pineapple skunk as my first choice at the dispensary. Completely satisfied. Looks great, tastes even better. Real heady. 2 thumbs up👍👍”
“VERY VERY STRONG. I’ve had this strain a few times and it’s knocked me out every time. I recommend for insomnia definitely as it puts you straight to sleep. One of my favourites”

“Hard hitting strain and quick... felt the effects almost immediately in the front of my face, then it spread to the shoulders and out from there in waves for the first 15-20 minutes, good medicine.

Very Indica effect, good for most of the day, but afternoon - evening being ideal... Cerebral effects come on as well, heady for a time, then relaxation, complex strain for sure.

Take too much and this will put you to sl...”
“Great strain! Smells amazing. Vapes well!”

“Hard hitting strain and quick... felt the effects almost immediately in the front of my face, then it spread to the shoulders and out from there in waves for the first 15-20 minutes, good medicine.

Very Indica effect, good for most of the day, but afternoon - evening being ideal... Cerebral effects come on as well, heady for a time, then relaxation, complex strain for sure.

Take too much and this will put you to sl...”
“very relaxing”
“this stuff is so good for pain”

“This strain has been one of my favorites so far. Unfortunately I get panic attacks/anxiety frequently when smoking, even with indicas, so I had been searching for a while for something that would keep me calm but also give me an enjoyable high. I think I finally found that with this strain. I've been smoking it almost every day for two weeks now and haven't experienced any anxiety or panic attacks at all, when before...”

“Im in love.  This is perfection at its best , i suffer from chronic back pain. This heavyweight is just what is needed to combat this pain . Full flavored , as i sit hear noticing the incredable   buzz i still have after an hour im in awe”

“Pineapple skunk is pretty tasty.Picked awhile back from White Mountain Health in Sun City AZ. Butch is putting together some tasty strains. She feels like a 50/50 if you like skunk give this  strain a go. Great day time strain especially for headache suffers.”
“very good medicine for social anxiety very talkative up lifting”
“A nice light, sweet citrusy-pineapple taste with a cheesey aroma.  Hard-hitting high that's relaxing and calming. I smoked a J on top of Green Mountain for a 6500ft high c/o Herban Medicinals.”
“Great strain was extremely focused, everything around me just stopped in a way highly recommend.”

“This was my second time finding this....na d had to give. It a second chance...again sadly the buds are DRY but Itdoes the job.

It’s a great pain, stress, all over MOTHETS LITTLE HLPEr n for daddies with BAD  pain.
At first it comes on HARD, then slowly takes over.
This IMO is a stay home strain...at least if your medicating.

I live in horrible pain, cardiac problems, lupus, and myriad of autoimmune disorders.
this...”

“I wish this did for me what it did for most of you. Smoked a gram by myself and it was ok, but there is better out there. Mine is from a medical dispensary so it could be it wasnt as potent as others.”
“Perfect for my pain levels!”
“Great terp, helpful, but have had better relief.”

“Absolutely fantastic for pain. Im a patient due to spinal injuries but recently had an abscessed tooth that was killing me. Happened to pick this up from my dispensary the same day my tooth started killing me.  Within 15 min... Gone... Same w my knee been sore for a week (im in construction) and it took it away quickly.  Taste out of my vape is pretty strong floral and sweet with a small hint of pineapple or berry.  ...”

“Pineapple Skunk is a awesome earthy and super sweet fruity tasting strain that I got here from the Philadelphia dispensaries. Becomming popular among patients with its fast physical effects for pain relief, pineapple skunk is a new patient favorite.”

“Pineapple Skunk is a awesome earthy and super sweet fruity tasting strain that I got here from the Philadelphia dispensaries. Becomming popular among patients with its fast physical effects for pain relief, pineapple skunk is a new patient favorite.”
“This one creeps up on you. I’d take 2 pulls and then wait 15 minutes to see how you feel. It brings on a heavy sedation. Must be indica dominant. Lasts 3-4 hours.”
“cool Great love it”
“Omg put me on my ass.....I'm in luv❤️ very tasty. Nice high”
“Not crazy strong but a good smoke . Doesn’t make you cough that much but you won’t be disappointed!”
“Great taste, better high!”
“LOVE this strain, my favorite at this point.  LOVE the grape flavor and the pain relief it gives!!!!  Very happy with this strain!”
“Was only 15% THC, but still found it to be a great strain. The smell is unbelievable and the reason I keep coming back to this one.”
“Great Strain. The Euphoria from this strain is lovely.”

“Absolutely fantastic for pain. Im a patient due to spinal injuries but recently had an abscessed tooth that was killing me. Happened to pick this up from my dispensary the same day my tooth started killing me.  Within 15 min... Gone... Same w my knee been sore for a week (im in construction) and it took it away quickly.  Taste out of my vape is pretty strong floral and sweet with a small hint of pineapple or berry.  ...”
“Perfect for my pain levels!”

“I wish this did for me what it did for most of you. Smoked a gram by myself and it was ok, but there is better out there. Mine is from a medical dispensary so it could be it wasnt as potent as others.”

“This was my second time finding this....na d had to give. It a second chance...again sadly the buds are DRY but Itdoes the job.

It’s a great pain, stress, all over MOTHETS LITTLE HLPEr n for daddies with BAD  pain.
At first it comes on HARD, then slowly takes over.
This IMO is a stay home strain...at least if your medicating.

I live in horrible pain, cardiac problems, lupus, and myriad of autoimmune disorders.
this...”

“Relaxing, chill high.
A happy high. Tingly body high.
Fragrant: cheesy and fruity”
“Sweet tropical smell and flavor. I use it to relax in the evening. Perfect on a lazy Sunday afternoon.”
“LOVE this strain, my favorite at this point.  LOVE the grape flavor and the pain relief it gives!!!!  Very happy with this strain!”
“Great taste, better high!”
“Omg put me on my ass.....I'm in luv❤️ very tasty. Nice high”
“cool Great love it”
“Great strain. Immediate cerebral effects, good for my anxiety, works more like an indica strain for me.”

“First of all I fell in love with this strain at first sight at the dispensary. It was covered in all types of good stuff. The light yellow hairs and darker yellow nuggets were a stand out. Very smooth hit, really relaxing feeling afterwards. I would recommend a nap afterwards. I paired it with a calypso cigarillo which complimented it well. Very light fruity taste. I'm sure it would be even better in a joint or in a ...”
“I love this strain, it is very relaxing. This  keeps me leveled and calm.”
“This is good”
“Gives off an earthy, not too dank sent. Tastes sweet and citrusy. Very soft relaxing high that wraps you in a blanket of warmth.”
“I like it”
“Giddy, euphoric and total pain relief!  This strain has it all!”

“Sweet smooth smell. 
Not too loud.
High hit me fast, full body high. I place tthis after girl scout cookies most definitely. A little goes a long way with this strain.”
“It was an okay Indica. The particular strain I tried did not have a very strong taste or smell which was disappointing. It was mellow and calming.”
“Excellent strain, great for insomnia. Causes couch lock syndrome so maybe not something to smoke in the middle of the day but a great high”

“I'm a busy body and this was an great relaxer for me that won't knock me out. I was content with doing nothing at all but watch anime and laugh. No brain fog though and has a great taste. I did get dry mouth a bit but it was a small portion so it probably would have been worse if I did not drink as much water as I did before smoking.”

“Really dense nugs, will make your eyes super bloodshot but it isn't a bad high otherwise. Unfortunately, really difficult to work on it (If you like to do chores, study, etc) and makes you pretty tired”
“I got a good deal on some of this. Worked great during the day for me. You can taste the pineapple!”

“This strain was pretty good I enjoyed gave me appetite, and it help me relax, if that's what you are looking for and it's a pretty good it's a Indica, good taste recommend trying it..🔥🔥 
Con side of it .. Thirsty!! 😳”
“So smooth hitting. Can really taste the citrus pineapple flavor, but the ash somehow goes minty. I always feel both very happy and very relaxed after smoking this, and use it frequently for art.”
“great for bed time but sever munchies from it”

“This shit is a amazing. On it rn😂 
It's like a so calming out of body feeling.”

“This strain had a wonderful smell. The bud structure was very large and fluffy with alot of trichomes. Its had hints of cheese and pineapple all throughout. I was not impressed at the effects of the medicine. I love cheese strain genetics but I would not recommend this strain to anyone.”
“makes me hilarious. good mood stuff.”

“As a medical user I scoffed a bit at the 15% thc but damn this hit hard. A little went a long way. Haven't had a sativa that had me this racy in a while. Wish I had the time to paint or something when I smoked this.”
“All of a sudden my body was numb and my brain felt like it was rattling in my head. You taste more of the pineapple and cheese over the skunk. But the smell afterwards is skunk!!!”

“HSO should be proud of this strain. Great genetics. Grows great, very strong pineapple/citrus sent. Sweet taste. Good mix between body and mind. Think they low balled the THC at 15% though... Great for med or rec.”
“Good shit”

“Quintessentially well balanced hybrid. It's got both. Euphoric body high with a friendly haze for your mind. Delicious flavor all the way through. A little sweetness in the aftertaste. One of our favorites.”

“An impressive bud all around. The color, trichomes, and red hairs give this strain visual appeal as does the smooth smell- pungent, but balanced. The smoke is also rather smooth and pleasant with effects that are relaxing, uplifting, calming, and perhaps even creative. It doesn't knock you out of your senses but the sensation is pleasantly noticeable. This may have been a 5-star review if it was not for the price (an...”
“by far one of my favorite.  easy to manage all day. high thc mast it enjoyable and puts me in a good mood.”
“It was an okay strain not a favorite.”
“Great strain for conversations”

“This is some good ish! It is very similar to Cheese, just not as clear of a head. I also am pretty relaxed right now. Upon hit you can definitely taste the skunky type diesel flavor as it fills your lungs.  You hold for a bit, then breathe right out. I'm basically a light-weigjt, but 1-3 hits should do the job if not accustomed like me to heavy smoking.  If you take 2 good (okayish hits, you get a head change. The 3r...”

“The other sturdy, inexpensive skunk that MW has to offer offers a body-high similar to you’d get with Grapefruit Skunk or any relative in the OG Kush family. Pineapple Skunk is a good mixing indica. It mixes nicely with Goji and any other citrus-oriented strain including Star 51 and Critical Mass.”
“fire”
